scripts.init: yarn run script:init && yarn install && yarn run init:frontend && yarn run init:backend
scripts.dev: yarn env:default yarn env:dev concurrently "yarn script:frontend:dev" "yarn script:backend:dev"
scripts.dev:frontend: yarn env:default yarn env:dev yarn script:frontend:dev
scripts.dev:backend: yarn env:default yarn env:dev yarn script:backend:dev
scripts.test:backend: yarn env:default yarn env:test yarn script:backend:test || exit 0
scripts.build:backend: yarn env:default yarn env:dev yarn script:backend:build
scripts.build:docker:frontend:dev: yarn env:default yarn env:dev yarn build:frontend:dev yarn script:build:docker:frontend
scripts.build:docker:frontend:prod: yarn env:default yarn env:production yarn script:build:docker:frontend
scripts.docker-compose:dev: yarn env:default yarn env:dev yarn run script:docker-compose:build
scripts.script:docker-compose: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up -d --force-recreate --build && docker image prune -f
scripts.frontend:production: yarn env:default yarn env:production yarn script:frontend:production
scripts.migration:export:dev: yarn env:default yarn env:dev yarn script:migration:export
